dc_description_s:
REMOTE DOWNLOAD NOT AVAILABLE - please contact data@library.columbia.edu for access. Shanxi Prefecture City Location and Census Data, 2000 is a point theme representing prefectures in Shanxi province in China in 2000.  Attribute information includes population variables from the China 2000 census. 

This data layer is part of the China 2000 Township Census data set produced by the All China Marketing Research Co. and distributed by the University of Michigan, China Data Center.
dc_title_s: Shanxi Prefecture City Location and Census Data, 2000
